mod.name: animated-smiles
mod.author: slawkens
mod.config: exhaustion = 1 -- in seconds storage = 3000 -- storage value used for exhaustion
mod.talkaction:
domodlib('animated-smiles-config')
function onSay(cid, words, param, channel) if(channel ~= CHANNEL_DEFAULT) then return false end
if(exhaustion.check(cid, storage)) then -- prevent spam return true end
if(isInArray({":*", ";*", "=*"}, words)) then doSendMagicEffect(getCreaturePosition(cid), CONST_ME_HEARTS) end
exhaustion.set(cid, storage, exhaustion) doCreatureSay(cid, words, TALKTYPE_ORANGE_1) return true end
